price: 88. Jie gyvens ten (Pragare). Nei jų kančia bus palengvinta, nei užlaikyta arba atidėta (kuriam laikui).
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yukhaffafu ʿanhumu al-ʿadhābu walā hum yunẓarūna
